ddl.statement: CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL)

queries.query: SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
WITH active_users AS (SELECT id FROM users WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_users)
